cx.description: Range for longitudes: in decimal degrees using WGS-84 datum, closed interval [-180.0 to 180.0].

cy.description: Range for latitudes:: in decimal degrees using WGS-84 datum, closed interval [-90.0 to 90.0].

endangle.description: All angles are expressed in degrees with a range of [0.0 to 360.0] progressing from 0.0 to 360.0 in the clockwise direction. When the angle indicates direction 0.0 indicates North. If a value is not specified a value of 0.0 is implied.

extension.description: Extension point for structured community of interest specific content.

label.description: A short text label describing the content.

metadata.description: named container for NDMS / Dublin Core defined metadata

rotation.description: Rotation of the symbol in degrees (0 = north). Counterclockwise

rx.description: The radius or length expressed in meters. This number should be positive.

ry.description: The radius or length expressed in meters. This number should be positive.

startangle.description: All angles are expressed in degrees with a range of [0.0 to 360.0] progressing from 0.0 to 360.0 in the clockwise direction. When the angle indicates direction 0.0 indicates North. If a value is not specified a value of 0.0 is implied.

symbol.description: Any valid symbol code Type in the scheme "chars+number" : any valid characters. Format: (symbol scheme):(symbol code) Example: app6b:G*C*MGPI--*****

textinfo.description: Additional human readlable text in addition to @label. Long text content should be placed here.

timestamp.description: comparable point in time (DTG) to represent the last state change of this element

rect.title: Rectangle with true ground measurement (identical ground distance for opposite sides of the rectangle)

cx.description: Range for longitudes: in decimal degrees using WGS-84 datum, closed interval [-180.0 to 180.0].

cy.description: Range for latitudes:: in decimal degrees using WGS-84 datum, closed interval [-90.0 to 90.0].

rotation.description: Rotation of the symbol in degrees (0 = north). Counterclockwise

rx.description: The radius or length expressed in meters. This number should be positive.

ry.description: The radius or length expressed in meters. This number should be positive.

fill.description: the color to fill an area with expressed as an hexadecimal RGB value. If the area should not be filled, the value is none, which is the default value.

fill-opacity.description: the opacity of an area that is filled expressed as a decimal value between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (opaque). The default value is 1, opaque.

fill-pattern.description: a pattern to fill the area with using the color defined by "fill". Valid values are: Dotted, MediumDotted, VerticalLine, HorizontalLine, DiagonalUpwardLine, DiagonalDownwardLine, DottedGrid, Grid, OutlinedDiamond, SolidDiamond, DiagonalBrick.

font-color.description: the color to render the text in expressed as an hexadecimal RGB value. The default value is #000000 (black).

font-family.description: the name of the font to use. The default font-family is system specific, use this attribute if you require a specific font. Keep in mind that the font may not exist in the system rendering the document.

font-size.description: height[unit] defaulted to px or specified physical units for scale-driven text size. Possible values are: px (pixels, default), m (meters), km (kilometers), nm (nautical miles). example: font-size:16px or font-size:12km

font-style.description: the style of the font with the following possible values: normal (default), italic

font-weight.description: the weight of the font with the following possible values: normal (default), bold

line-pattern-begin.description: (first point): Line pattern valid values are: None, Arrow, OpenArrow, StealthArrow, DiamondArrow, OvalArrow

line-pattern-begin-size.description: a value from 1 to 3. Line pattern size default '2' to 3x stroke size. Other scaling for value '1' (2x of stroke size) and value '3' (5x of stroke size).

line-pattern-end.description: (last point): Line pattern valid values are: None, Arrow, OpenArrow, StealthArrow, DiamondArrow, OvalArrow

line-pattern-end-size.description: a value from 1 to 3, Line pattern size default '2' to 3x stroke size. Other scaling for value '1' (2x of stroke size) and value '3' (5x of stroke size).

stroke.description: the color of a line expressed as an hexadecimal RGB value. Default value is #000000 (black).

stroke-dash.description: the dashed representation of the line with the following valid values: none - (default) Indicates that no dashing is used (a solid line), <dasharray> - A list of comma-separated <length>'s specified in pixels. All <length>'s must positive values greater than zero. For example: stroke-dash='5,3,2'

stroke-opacity.description: the opacity of a line expressed as a decimal value between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (opaque). Default value is 1.0 (opaque).

stroke-width.description: the width of a line expressed in number of pixels. Default value is 1.

text-align.description: Specifies the alignment of the text with respect to the reference point (x, y) prior to rotation. Valid values are: left, right, center (default).

vertical-align.description: Specifies the vertical alignment of the text with respect to the reference point (x, y) prior to rotation. Valid values are: top, middle (default), bottom.

extension.description: Extension point for structured community of interest specific content.

label.description: A short text label describing the content.

metadata.description: named container for NDMS / Dublin Core defined metadata

rotation.description: Rotation of the symbol in degrees (0 = north). Counterclockwise

textinfo.description: Additional human readlable text in addition to @label. Long text content should be placed here.

timestamp.description: comparable point in time (DTG) to represent the last state change of this element

x.description: Range for longitudes: in decimal degrees using WGS-84 datum, closed interval [-180.0 to 180.0].

y.description: Range for latitudes:: in decimal degrees using WGS-84 datum, closed interval [-90.0 to 90.0].

timespan.description: A pair of items (<begin> and <end>, each one is optional) to define a show/hide period (based on strict DTG) for the shape as defined by KML TimeSpan. Timezone information is required.

description: JSON encoding of the NATO Vector Graphics (NVG) latest v2.0.x data format.
